feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing the 5-line fade‑in confirmation message and related frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including App, evasive button hook, CSS, and Tailwind config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme variables and light/dark OKLCH color tokens with global background/foreground setup.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main UI with Valentine question, Yes/No buttons, evasive No behavior, and confirmation state with fade‑in 5‑line message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and refreshing authenticated or anonymous backend actors via react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvasiveNoButton.ts: Hook that repositions the No button based on mouse or touch proximity using throttled, animated movement.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and status.
frontend/src/index.css: Romantic-theme Tailwind layers, color tokens, utilities, animations, and global typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint wiring React Query, Internet Identity provider, global CSS, and rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, custom colors, container settings, animations, and extended theme tokens using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, including Valentine UI requirements, features, and architecture notes for a single-page interactive experience.
